codes.FDMS: Factoring service provider, Factoring client and third party in the same country
codes.FEXP: Factoring service provider, Factoring client in the same country, third party in another country
codes.FFDM: Factoring client and third party in the same country, Factoring service provider in another country
codes.FFDT: Factoring service provider, Factoring client and third party in the same country, but factoring client has an exceptional VAT ruling, for example if it’s overseas
codes.FIMP: Factoring service provider and third party in the same country, Factoring client in another country
codes.FREX: Factoring service provider, Factoring client and third party in three different countries

description: Specifies the external trade market code in the format of character string with a maximum length of 4 characters.
name: ExternalTradeMarket1Code
